title: Just delete this champion already for Christ's sake.
body:
120 base damage AD scaling Q with a 2 second fucking cooldown.

W that blocks literally everything no matter what you throw at it.

E that makes every mobility spell in the game seem like it's useless.

R being a hard CC spell that you'll easily get under a one minute cooldown and that is basically a death sentence.

I think you already know who I'm talking about.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
{{champion:6}}
;)

replies.body:
Just looked it up, can confirm.  Actually, the only thing he (you?) got wrong was saying that Urgot's Q has 120 base damage.  It actually has 1*30*.  
0_0
######(Please don't edit the post to say 130, my post won't be even remotely funny anymore)
Reposting it in Memes and Games instead of Gameplay because it just seemed more fitting to me. Some people also didn't get the joke.
did some people complain about yasuo without even reading the whole post?
Apparently, someone did this time as well
I am 100% sure that guy is joking. You can tell by his reference to the "suggestion"

But you're not wrong... 



~~x  ^)~~
Well played.
I hate Yasuo too but I don't think he should be deleted. Their was a good suggestion saying he should only be able to ult off his own knock-ups which I think is a great idea.

The joke -----------




 your head.   o

The joke -----------
your head. o

The joke -----------

your head. o
scrolled past the punchline all the way to the comment section
I laughed more at this guys reply than the original post.

> [{quoted}](name=KoKoboto,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YWsHdEuB,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-12-14T04:15:05.860+0000)
>
> I hate Yasuo too but I don't think he should be deleted. Their was a good suggestion saying he should only be able to ult off his own knock-ups which I think is a great idea.



...?

I can't tell if this is sarcastic or not.
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/992/384/ded.gif
This would be a lot better if the line about his E wasn't completely wrong. Most mobility spells in the game actually make a mockery of it...
I think he means once you get hit with the hit you can't dodge his Q
I knew that's what he meant. My point is that you can usually easily avoid the whole thing by just dashing/blinking to dodge the initial shot.
If you get hit with his E you will still take 2 Q's after even if you have mobility like Riven or Lucian. While slightly deceptive it does come out accurate if you look at it this way.

I was well aware of what they meant. But my point is more legit because most champions who can often dodge stuff just avoid the whole thing by dodging the initial E, and that's what usually does happen. Also you can actually out range the tracer Qs, it's just kinda hard for most champs because it does have a long range during the E debuff.
For real, I can't stand him. In every game, urgot is so broken it's dumb.
ETERNAL LIFE! ENDLESS TORTURE! {{champion:6}}
To be fair, in every game you face him, its most likely someone who knows how to use him.
uhh W doesnt block hard cc?

now here is the real joke of the day.

130 base plus the scaling still makes his dps lower than most adc's

fun story: in 1forAll, we had {{champion:6}}  (my pick) and they had the {{champion:74}} Donger.
We destroyed them. Riot plz nerf
Funny thing is that Urgot was nerfed into the ground because of how strong his kit is.
Ahh, how I wish I could've played Urgot in his hayday of 1.2 AD scaling on Q and 1500 range on Lock-On Q.

I'm an Urgot main. Knew exactly who you were talking about, though it's intentionally misleading. Urgot's shield can be broken, removing the stacking slow from his Acid Hunters, and his Noxian Corrosive Charge is much stronger against champs without mobility, as highly mobile champs like Zed or Yasuo will dash tf out of there as soon as they can, largely negating your damage.

I was reading this at first thinking it was another boring yas hate thread then scrolled down to suddenly and actually SCREAM in my dorm room while jumping up and down like a wild maniac who's high. URGOD! URGOD! URGOD! PRAISE THE URGOD! URGOD! Too bad that $50 fine from an RA will kill me ;(

I could tell it wasn't going to be Yasuo, but I couldn't guess who it was because of the W.

Only other W's I could come up with were Morg and Braum shields, and they didn't apply to the rest of the kit.
Urgot's W is so non-existent if he actually gets hit that I forget it's an ability.
